items.content_html: React-Iconic is a lightweight npm package offering scalable and customizable SVG icons for React apps, ideal for modern and visually appealing interfaces.
items.title: devsany/iconic: React-Iconic is a lightweight npm package offering scalable and customizable SVG icons for React apps, ideal for modern and visually appealing interfaces.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient web scraping tool built with Node.js. This scraper extracts specific data (like headings, links, or custom elements) from any webpage, enabling easy extraction of information for data analysis, automation, or integration into other applications.
items.title: Mekhadev2025/ScrapeFlow: A lightweight and efficient web scraping tool built with Node.js. This scraper extracts specific data (like headings, links, or custom elements) from any webpage, enabling easy extraction of information for data analysis, automation, or integration into other applications.

items.content_html: A Weather Forecasting Web Application built using Vanilla JavaScript that provides current and 5-day weather forecasts for cities worldwide. It fetches data from the OpenWeather API, includes a search feature for city-based forecasts, and supports location-based weather updates using Geolocation API. Fully responsive and lightweight.
items.title: AnsariMdRizwan/weather_web_page: A Weather Forecasting Web Application built using Vanilla JavaScript that provides current and 5-day weather forecasts for cities worldwide. It fetches data from the OpenWeather API, includes a search feature for city-based forecasts, and supports location-based weather updates using Geolocation API. Fully responsive and lightweight.

items.content_html: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.
items.title: kenjiakira/Vue-Tiktok: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.

items.content_html: A lightweight task management system built with React, TypeScript, and Redux Toolkit. Manage tasks with features like priority levels, due dates, and completion status. Perfect for learning state management and TypeScript in React projects.
items.title: devfardin/Simple-Task-Management-System: A lightweight task management system built with React, TypeScript, and Redux Toolkit. Manage tasks with features like priority levels, due dates, and completion status. Perfect for learning state management and TypeScript in React projects.

items.content_html: Market Depth Generator is a lightweight library for simulating market depth, trade data, and OHLC candlesticks. Designed for trading platforms and financial applications, it generates realistic trading data with customizable configurations.

items.content_html: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
